lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In a statement, the company said it defeated a hostile takeover attempt, by GAF Corp <GAF>, and recapitalized the company, adding, "While all this was going on, our continuing businesses performed very soundly, with substantial operating profit improvement over 1985."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Included in the 1986 numbers are a 564 mln dlr gain from sale of the different businesses, a 270 mln dlr pension credit and a charge of 473 mln dlrs from the purchase of long term debt at a premium under the recapitalization.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Operating profit in the fourth quarter for all of the company's operations on a consolidated basis, before corporate and interest expense and taxes, was 181 mln dlrs against a loss of three mln dlrs in the 1985 quarter.
